All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ChatBotActivity
Activity that facilitates communication with a chatbot powered by OpenAI via Azure.
Comment
Class that stores the details of a comment
CommentTest
Creates the comment tests
CreatePostActivity
Creates the functionality to create a post
CreatePostActivityTest
Creates the create post activity test
Database
Creates a database class to allow interacting with the database
DateTimeManager
Manages date and time operations for mood editing
DateTimeManager.OnDateTimeChangedListener
Creates an interface for the listener
EditMoodActivity
EditMoodActivity provides functionality to modify existing mood events.
EditMoodActivityTest
This test verifies that a mood seeded by the database can be edited through the app's UI
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
FeedActivity
FeedActivity is an activity that displays the mood history of a user.
FeedActivityUITest
Test class for FeedActivity using Espresso framework.
FeedManager
FeedManager is a utility class responsible for managing following data in Firestore.
FeedManager.FeedCallback
Callback interface for fetching mood history.
FeedManager.FollowingCallback
Callback interface for fetching the following list.
Filter
The Filter class provides utility methods for filtering mood history based on different criteria such as time, emotional state, keywords, and location proximity.
FollowerListAdapter
This adapter handles the individual followers.
FollowerListFragment
The purpose of this fragment is to handle the listView Fragment for the follower list.
FollowingListAdapter
This adapter handles displaying the contents of the followingList into the listView.
FollowingListFragment
The purpose of this fragment is to handle the listView Fragment for the following list.
FollowRequestAdapter
This adapter handles the individual follow requests.
FollowRequestFragment
The purpose of this fragment is to handle the listView Fragment for the follow requests.
HomePageActivity
The HomePageActivity serves as the main landing page after the user logs in or signs up.
LocationHelper
This class helps in obtaining the user's location using Google's FusedLocationProviderClient.
LocationHelper.LocationListener
Interface to provide callbacks for location updates or errors.
LocationMapActivity
Displays the map for filtered mood feed,history, and 5k
LocationPermissionFragment
Fragment for requesting location permissions and retrieving location data.
LocationPermissionFragment.OnLocationReceivedListener
Interface to handle location retrieval.
LocationPermissionFragment.OnPermissionGrantedListener
Interface to notify CreatePostActivity when permission is granted.
LocationPickerActivity
Allows the user to select a location
LoginActivity
Creates the activity that lets the user log in
MainActivity
Launches the main screen
MapTest
Creates the comment tests
MoodArrayAdapter
Creates an array adapter for the add mood that display the moods
MoodDetailsActivity
MoodDetailsActivity displays comprehensive information about a selected mood post.
MoodDetailsActivityTest
Intent tests for MoodDetailsActivity
MoodDropdownManager
Allows for the mood drop down selection
MoodDropdownManager.MoodSelectedListener
 
MoodHistoryActivity
MoodHistoryActivity is an activity that displays the mood history of a user.
MoodHistoryActivityUITest
This class contains UI tests for the MoodHistoryActivity.
MoodHistoryManager
MoodHistoryManager is a utility class responsible for managing mood history data in Firestore.
MoodHistoryManager.MoodHistoryCallback
Callback interface for fetching mood history.
MoodMediaManager
Manages media operations like images and location for mood editing
MoodRepository
Repository class to handle all Firestore update operations related to moods
MoodRepository.OnMoodDeleteListener
 
MoodRepository.OnMoodUpdateListener
 
MoodSelectionAdapter
Creates an array adapter to display the mood dropdown
MoodState
Creates an abstract emotion class that all of the emotions extend
MoodStateTest
Runs tests for the mood state class
NavBarFragment
Nav bar fragment functionality The navBar carries the currentUsername into the intents that it opens.
OpenAIClientHelper
Helper class for interacting with OpenAI's API.
OpenAIClientHelper.OpenAICallback
Interface for handling OpenAI API responses.
OtherProfileActivity
Creates the view profile screen
PlaceholderContent
Helper class for providing sample content for user interfaces created by Android template wizards.
PlaceholderContent.PlaceholderItem
A placeholder item representing a piece of content.
ProfileActivity
Creates the view profile screen, contains links to the followRequestFragment, FollowingListFragment and FollowerListFragment Requires the currentUsername of the logged in user to be given in the intent.
SearchActivity
SearchActivity allows the user to use a search interface for finding other users profiles This class interacts with the following components: - UserAdapter: Displays the user results in a recycler view - User: Model for the users information - NavBarFragment: Provides navigation capabilities
SearchActivityTest
UI tests for SearchActivity using Espresso.
SignUpActivity
Activity for signing up
SocialSituationManager
Creates a manager for social situation
User
Creates the user class to keep track of users interactions with others and moods
UserAdapter
UserAdapter is a RecyclerView adapter for displaying a list of users.
UserAdapter.UserViewHolder
ViewHolder class for user items in the RecyclerView
UserLoginTest
Creates a test for loging in
UserManager
The purpose of this class is to facilitate interactions for a User object and the database This class helps with the signup and login functionalities.
UserManager.LoginCallback
 
UserManager.SignUpCallback
 
UserSignupTest
Runs a test for singing up
UserTest
Runs a test to ensure all user functions are valid
